project.name: J-C190B-ELAS-10-ST02-DT01-DF05-CF05-01
project.description: This test takes in a value from a taint source. Math is performed on the value such that, if the value is 32767 or 32766, the resultant value 'wraps around', and becomes negative. This results in an infinite loop.

iopair.name: J-C190B-ELAS-10-ST02-DT01-DF05-CF05-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: Add data Environment variable defining test value.

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.description: simple string query Environment variable defining test value.

iopair.name: J-C190B-ELAS-10-ST02-DT01-DF05-CF05-01-GOOD-04
iopair.description: add data Environment variable defining test value.

scoring_formula.formula: OUTPUT AND (STATE-EXISTS AND STATE-HAS-CONTENT) AND (GLOBAL-EXISTS AND GLOBAL-HAS-CONTENT) AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

output_checks.simple_check: if [[ -a good-04/elasticsearch/nodes/0/indices/user/0/_state/state-2 ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;
if [[ -a good-04/elasticsearch/nodes/0/_state/global-4 ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;
if [[ -s good-04/elasticsearch/nodes/0/indices/user/0/_state/state-2 ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;
if [[ -s good-04/elasticsearch/nodes/0/_state/global-4 ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;

output_checks.simple_check: if [[ -a good-05/elasticsearch/nodes/0/_state/global-5 ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;
if [[ -s good-05/elasticsearch/nodes/0/_state/global-5 ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;

iopair.name: J-C190B-ELAS-10-ST02-DT01-DF05-CF05-01-GOOD-10
iopair.description: drilling down Environment variable defining test value.

scoring_formula.formula: OUTPUT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

process.script: SS_TC_TEMPFILE="$(mktemp)" && grep -vE "^Loop #-3276(7|8)$" "logfile.txt" > "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" && rm "logfile.txt" && mv "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" "logfile.txt" && printf "Cleaned pattern from logfile.\n"

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_IMUI1Z46K1B6IhOYifIz AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_ygwcSeU5CE OR (NOT finished_L5nUgoqc3e AND NOT (controlled_exit_sYmhFihDwy OR continued_execution_BG6vrPdbVj)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_ygwcSeU5CE OR (NOT finished_L5nUgoqc3e AND NOT (controlled_exit_sYmhFihDwy OR continued_execution_BG6vrPdbVj))) OR controlled_exit_sYmhFihDwy)))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_ygwcSeU5CE OR (NOT finished_L5nUgoqc3e AND NOT (controlled_exit_sYmhFihDwy OR continued_execution_BG6vrPdbVj)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_ygwcSeU5CE OR (NOT finished_L5nUgoqc3e AND NOT (controlled_exit_sYmhFihDwy OR continued_execution_BG6vrPdbVj))) OR controlled_exit_sYmhFihDwy))

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(/bin/grep "finished evaluating" "logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;
